articles.author: Peter_Bukowski
articles.title: Packers defense makes hay with changes players asked for from coaches - Acme Packing Company
articles.description: The stars upfront for the Green Bay defense asked Mike Pettine to tweak the scheme, to simplify things and just let them play. It paid off in a dominating performance against the Eagles on Sunday.
articles.content: ZaDarius Smith hes just like you. After the Green Bay Packers put together a successful, albeit unsexy, game plan to hold down the Chicago Bears offense with Mitch Trubisky and furthered a troubling … [+6977 chars]
